author: Cortex XSOAR

automation.description:
Cleanup the incidents and indicators created by OnboardingIntegration

This automation runs using the default Limited User role, unless you explicitly change the permissions.
For more information, see the section about permissions here:
https://docs.paloaltonetworks.com/cortex/cortex-xsoar/6-2/cortex-xsoar-admin/playbooks/automations.html
automation.name: OnboardingCleanup

classifier.description: Maps incoming Onboarding integration incident fields.
classifier.name: Onboarding Integration - Incoming Mapper

commands.description: Gets the simulated reputation of the IP address.
commands.name: demo-ip

commands.description: Gets the simulated reputation of the URL address.
commands.name: demo-url

commands.description: Gets the simulated reputation of the domain.
commands.name: demo-domain

commands.description: Gets the simulated reputation of the file hash.
commands.name: demo-file

commands.description: Gets the simulated reputation of the email address.
commands.name: demo-email

integration.description: Creates mock email incidents using one of two randomly selected HTML templates. Textual content is randomly generated and defined to include some text (100 random words) and the following data (at least 5 of each data type): IP addresses, URLs, SHA-1 hashes, SHA-256 hashes, MD5 hashes, email addresses, domain names.
integration.name: OnboardingIntegration

playbook.description: This playbook is part of the on-boarding experience, and focuses on phishing scenarios. To use this playbook, you'll need to enable the `on-boarding` integration and configure incidents of type `Phishing`. For more information, refer to the on-boarding walkthroughs in the help section.
playbook.name: PhishingDemo-Onboarding

description: Creates mock email incidents using one of two randomly selected HTML templates. Textual content is randomly generated and defined to include some text (100 random words) and the following data (at least 5 of each data type): IP addresses, URLs, SHA-1 hashes, SHA-256 hashes, MD5 hashes, email addresses, domain names.
name: OnboardingIntegration
